column2: The  learned Counsel  for the-petitioner moves to withdraw this application  on  the basis  that the
petitioner  is  willing  to  make  representations  to  the  relevant  authorities  in  view  of the  reliefs
prayed  for in  the petition of the petitioner. Application is  allowed.
